# Ayahuasca Iquitos Project

This is a bilingual (Spanish/English) website for Casa del Jaguar, an ayahuasca ceremonies business in Iquitos, Peru.

## Project Setup Status

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Customize the Project  
- [x] Install Required Extensions
- [x] Compile the Project
- [x] Create and Run Task
- [x] Launch the Project
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React Context for i18n (Spanish/English)

## Design
- Warm, trustful colors (earth tones: browns, greens, golds)
- Nature-inspired aesthetics
- Responsive design

## Components
- Hero: Welcome section with main CTA
- About: Information about ceremonies and approach
- Maestros: Showcase of spiritual guides
- Location: Iquitos location benefits
- Ayahuasca: Information section
- LanguageToggle: ES/EN switcher button

## Development
- Development server running at http://localhost:3000
- Hot reload enabled
- All translations managed in LanguageContext
